name: Sushi Quest
description:
In Sushi Quest you take control of three cats, and have to navigate a series of levels, where you need to solve puzzles in order to make each cat reach one of the balloons.

The gameplay was inspired by the Lost Vikings for the SNES, each cat has special abilities and you need to keep switching between them to reach the goals.

Sushi Quest was my first commercial game, released in 2011.
Art was done by Daniël Van Leeuwen

I'm now offering the game for free, however note that I can't offer any kind of support for this game anymore. It was made in a custom engine,  using an old version of OpenGL, so I don't have a clue how compatible it is with latest OSX / Linux / Windows.
